This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was standing out in the backyard, smoking a cigarette and saw what I thought was a bright star, but it looked too big for a star. It looked like it had a smaller circle of light in the center and spikes of light all around it. It looked like one of those sun's that children draw with a circle and the lines coming out all around it. I woke up my wife and had her take a picture of it. My wife pressed auto levels and colors came out. It looked exactly like this without all the colors before she pressed auto levels, though.
Summary: Round object with lines of light around it
